articles.author: John Mulligan
articles.title: Billionaire Comer brothers have agreed to pay up to €20m to buy Waterford Airport - Independent.ie
articles.description: The billionaire Comer brothers – the Galway-born investors who own a huge property portfolio across Europe – have agreed to pay up to €20m to buy a majority stake in Waterford Airport, the Irish Independent has learned.

articles.author: Gavin Cummiskey
articles.title: 'How come Irish teams cannot do this?' - Stephen Bradley hits out against European travel nightmare for LOI teams - The Irish Times
articles.description: Farcical situation saw St Pat’s stranded in Sofia and Rovers having to fly into Shannon while CSKA and Ludogorets managed to land in Dublin
articles.content:
Shamrock Rovers manager Stephen Bradley has called on Dublin airport to ensure that Irish football clubs are not punished for success in European competition.
